mapper.update: update extremity_role set status = #{status},updated_time = sysdate() where id = #{idRole}
update extremity_role set name = #{name}, input_code = #{inputCode}, weights = #{weights}, updated_time = sysdate() where id = #{idRole}
mapper.select: select er.* from extremity_user_role eur left join extremity_role er on eur.id_role = er.id where id_user = #{id}
SELECT ur.id_role FROM extremity_user u JOIN extremity_user_role ur ON u.id = ur.id_user WHERE u.account = #{account} or u.email = #{account}
select ur.id_user, ur.id_role, ur.created_time, r.name ,ur.activated from extremity_user_role ur join extremity_role r ON r.id = ur.id_role where id_user = #{idUser}

select ur.id_user, ur.id_role, ur.created_time, r.name ,ur.activated, u.email, u.avatar_url, u.nickname from extremity_user_role ur join extremity_role r ON r.id = ur.id_role join extremity_user u ON u.id = ur.id_user where ur.activated = 0 AND r.id = #{idRole}

select ur.id_user, ur.id_role, ur.created_time, r.name ,ur.activated, u.email, u.avatar_url, u.nickname from extremity_user_role ur join extremity_role r ON r.id = ur.id_role join extremity_user u ON u.id = ur.id_user where ur.activated = 1 AND r.id = #{idRole}
